channel.title: Vista Help
channel.description:
okk wen i open my computer and on the left hand side where it says "Favourite Links" its empty all of a sudden .. n i tried to copy n paste like my music folder in there but it wont let me..? i had all the folders in there before but wen i turned on my computer this morning they wer all gone .. i also tried to restore the default links that also doesnt work.. does anyone know how i can put my folders or files back in the Favourite Links..? also when i try to save anything it doesnt show the favourite links also.. [URL=http://img58.imageshack.us/my.php?image=66381335yy4.jpg][IMG]http://img58.imageshack.us/img58/7287/66381335yy4.th.jpg[/img][/URL]
here is a picture incase you need it [URL=http://img78.imageshack.us/my.php?image=26715120by4.jpg][IMG]http://img78.imageshack.us/img78/1387/26715120by4.th.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img111.imageshack.us/my.php?image=50097811gj2.jpg][IMG]http://img111.imageshack.us/img111/7307/50097811gj2.th.jpg[/img][/URL]
thanks

item.title: Vista Help
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Is your music on one of those removable disks? Because sometimes my complete music library in Winamp gets deleted, and all my music is on my external hdd. I don’t know why it does it though. Probably because it isn’t turned on all the time.

Read full topic

okk wen i open my computer and on the left hand side where it says “Favourite Links” its empty all of a sudden … n i tried to copy n paste like my music folder in there but it wont let me…?
i had all the folders in there before but wen i turned on my computer this morning they wer all gone …
i also tried to restore the default links that also doesnt work…
does anyone know how i can put my folders or files back in the Favourite Links…?
also when i try to save anything it doesnt show the favourite links also…
